ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities have focused on osu!taiko gameplay balance, including changes to rhythm and stamina mechanics. Pull requests have introduced new penalties for repeated rhythm patterns, rebalanced star ratings and performance points, and modified stamina bonuses for consecutive notes.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities have included updates to the wiki, such as the addition of a new article for the ANZT6W tournament and translations for the 'Game mode' section. The contributions aim to improve the documentation and accessibility of the osu! wiki.

ppy/SDL3-CS.summary: Recent activities have included updates to the bindings, such as adding pen support for iOS and Android, and removing outdated files. These changes aim to improve the functionality and compatibility of the SDL3-CS project.
